import React from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { LayoutDashboard, Users, Package, Settings, ClipboardList, DollarSign, BarChart2, // Changed from ChartBar to BarChart2 BellRing, Activity, } from 'lucide-react'; const MenuItem = ({ to, icon: Icon, children }) => ( `flex items-center space-x-3 px-4 py-3 text-gray-700 hover:bg-blue-50 hover:text-blue-600 rounded-lg transition-colors ${ isActive ? 'bg-blue-50 text-blue-600 font-medium' : '' }` } > {children} ); const AdminSidebar = ({ className = '' }) => { return (
{/* Dashboard Section */}

DASHBOARD

Overview Performance Metrics
{/* Management Section */}

MANAGEMENT

Courier Management User Management Pricing Management
{/* Reports Section */}

REPORTS

Activity Logs Reports
{/* System Section */}

SYSTEM

Notifications Settings
); }; export default AdminSidebar;
